#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int


int main()
{
    ll t,n,i;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        if(n%2==1||n==0)
                printf("0\n");
        else
        {
            printf("9");
            for(i=1;i<n/2;i++)
                printf("0");
            printf("\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
